Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene

Class AlixDocument

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.AlixDocument
public class AlixDocument extends Object
From HTML data, Populate a lucene/alix document ready to index, with right fields names and types. Lucene document should be reusable, it will be cleared each time an id is set.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AlixDocument(String[] required)
    Create document indexer with a list of required fields, tested when lucene document is requested.

      This for chaining.

    • catField

      public AlixDocument catField(String name, String html)
      A field type unique for a document, usually mandatory, like a title or byline ; maybe a covering class among a corpus. Could be used for sorting. Not searchable by word.
      Parameters:
      name - Field name.
      html - Field value, tags allowed.
      Returns:
      This for chaining.

    • facetField

      public AlixDocument facetField(String name, String html)
      A field repeatable for a document, like authors, or tags. Not searchable by word.
      Parameters:
      name - Field name.
      html - Field value, tags allowed.
      Returns:
      This for chaining.
